page.title: 10Getting to School in Retford
page.content: We located school at the centre of a {time and direction}chart.We found that 75%of our class{walk}to school.Most of these people are{located}to the NEast of school.The greatest{density} of people live in the NEast sector within five minutes walking distance from school. Three people from the S.West walk to school.Three people from the NWest,walk .Alison and John live in the NWest on the Hallcroft estate.Alison takes the bus and John cycles in.Our teacher lives a mile away from school and it takes him about twenty minutes to walk to school . I have noticed that the three people in the SWest and the walker from the NWest districts take the longest time.
